section.name: Release Note
section.p: The current release of jake is a work in progress prototype. Some core functionalities like synchronization an inter client communication are only simulated. Since it is only a prototype some constraints have been chosen to make implementation easier yet jake is still showing its capabilities anyway.

ul.li: File and folder names must comply to the following expression: [a-zA-Z0-9\-_.]
User Names must contain the '@' character to be a valid userId
It is not advised to change the the userId of the local user
Shared files must not exceed a 2gb file size limit.
To successfully log in use a userId for both userId and password.
Remote users containing a 's' before the '@' in their userId are always online
Remote users containing a 'n' before the '@' in their userId push a new version of 'Projektauftrag/Lastenheft.txt' upen every logsync.
